column5: 1 upstairs bedroom with 2 twin beds. Private bathroom next to bedroom. Free WiFi. Quiet neighborhood close to airport, River Walk, downtown, the Alamo, museums, the Zoo, shopping, Fiesta Texas, Sea World and great restaurants. We warmly welcome you with morning coffee/tea. Feel free to use the well-equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Relax on the patio. This is your home-away-from home!! Your privacy is our priority. You will be comfortable here!
column8: COMFORTABLE, QUIET & PRIVATE HOME CENTRAL LOCATION
